attributes.action: I would like subject content to be cut for year 10s now for their gcses
attributes.additional_details: We missed out of the whole of year 9 and most of year ten I’m not sure how this is fair to make us sit exams when we keep missing and going over things missed
attributes.background: I want them to remove content for gcses in 2022

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Amend GCSE exam content for children that are now in year 9 and year 10: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568162

Reduce content for 2022 A-level and GCSE exams: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566803

Review 2022 exam arrangements for GCSEs and A-levels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566569
